thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 22 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Valeritas Announces V-Go Distribution Agreement In Italy With Movi SpA

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Valeritas Announces V-Go Distribution Agreement In Italy With Movi SpA
text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - Valeritas Holdings Inc:
* VALERITAS ANNOUNCES V-GO® DISTRIBUTION AGREEMENT IN ITALY WITH MOVI SPA
* VALERITAS - CO WILL RETAIN RESPONSIBILITY FOR PRODUCT DEVELOPMENT, REGULATORY APPROVAL, QUALITY MANAGEMENT, AND MANUFACTURING UNDER AGREEMENT​
* VALERITAS HOLDINGS INC - ‍MOVI WILL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR SALES, MARKETING, CUSTOMER SUPPORT AND DISTRIBUTION ACTIVITIES IN ITALY UNDER AGREEMENT​
* VALERITAS - GRANTED MOVI RIGHTS TO PROMOTE, MARKET, SELL CO‘S PRODUCT V-GO WEARABLE INSULIN DELIVERY DEVICE TO DIABETES CLINICS, PATIENTS IN ITALY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
